title: Davids troubles remembred in 1. Absolons sheep-shearing. 2. Ioab projecting. 3. Bathsheba bathing. 4. Israel rebelling. 5. Ahitophel hanging. 6. David returning.
author: Aylett, Robert, 1583-1655?, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by Richard Hodgkinsonne, and are to be sold by Daniel Frere, at the signe of the Bull in Little-Britan,
notes: The numbered lines are bracketed together on the title page.
